title: LISTENING: What You’re Missing and Why it Matters
description: In the cacophony of modern life, it can seem that talking, scoring points, and being heard are more important than paying attention to what others have to say. But journalist Kate Murphy says listening — really listening — can strengthen our ties to the people closest to us and create new connections in our lives.

itunes:author: Next Big Idea Club
